name: Cafe
subtitle: Your productivity companion
versionDescription: Initial release with tasks, calendar, AI chat, messaging, and theming
localizedDescription:
Cafe is a comprehensive productivity app that helps you manage tasks, schedule events, chat with AI assistants, and stay organized. Features include:

• Task Management with smart lists and templates
• Calendar with event scheduling
• AI Chat Assistant for productivity help
• User-to-user messaging with presence indicators
• Financial management (coming soon)
• 15 beautiful themes (light and dark)
• Customizable navigation
• Offline support with sync
• Widgets and Live Activities
• Biometric authentication

permissions.usageDescription: Cafe needs access to your photos to attach images to tasks and messages
Cafe needs access to your camera to capture images and scan documents
Cafe needs access to your microphone for voice input and speech recognition
Cafe sends notifications for task reminders and event alerts
Cafe syncs your data in the background to keep everything up to date

privacy.NSPhotoLibraryUsageDescription: Cafe needs access to your photos to attach images to tasks and messages

privacy.NSMicrophoneUsageDescription: Cafe needs microphone access for voice input and speech recognition
privacy.NSSpeechRecognitionUsageDescription: Cafe uses speech recognition to convert your voice to text
privacy.NSFaceIDUsageDescription: Cafe uses Face ID to securely lock and unlock the app
